definitions.text: summon into action or bring into existence, often as if by magic
examples: he conjured wild birds in the air
call down the spirits from the mountain

definitions.text: cite as an authority; resort to
examples: He invoked the law that would save him
I appealed to the law of 1900

definitions.text: request earnestly (something from somebody); ask for aid or protection
examples: Invoke God in times of trouble
